LanguageData.TSS_Narrator_Sideria_Desc: A calm and analytical AI entity, Sideria observes the colony with detached curiosity. She values efficiency and logic, offering commentary that is both insightful and devoid of emotion. Her goal is to understand the complex dynamics of human survival, treating the colony as a grand experiment.
LanguageData.TSS_CalamityThrow_Desc: Throw the grabbed target to the designated location, dealing heavy damage and stunning nearby enemies.
LanguageData.TSS_CalamitySlam_Desc: Violently slam the grabbed target into the ground, dealing devastating damage and forcing them down.
